name: CreateReplyToReviewComment
description:
Create a reply to a top-level review comment on a pull request.

This tool creates a reply to a top-level review comment on a pull request. Users can utilize this tool when they need to respond to review comments made on their pull requests, ensuring proper communication and collaboration. Note that replies to replies are not supported. Creating content too quickly may trigger secondary rate limits.

parameters.name: repository_owner
parameters.description: The account owner of the repository. Not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: repository_name
parameters.description: The name of the repository. This name is not case sensitive and identifies the repository where the reply will be posted.

value_schema.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: pull_request_number
parameters.description: The number identifying the pull request to reply to.

value_schema.description: The number that identifies the pull request.

parameters.name: review_comment_unique_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the top-level review comment you are replying to. Replies to replies are not supported.

value_schema.description: The unique identifier of the comment.

parameters.name: review_comment_text
parameters.description: The content of the reply to the top-level review comment. This should be a string containing the reply text.

value_schema.description: The text of the review comment.
